name: FNF X DDLC MOD
description:
Friday Night Funkin' X DDLC (Doki Doki Literature Club) is a new MOD for FNF featuring Monika, Natsuki, Sayori and Yuri in a whole new week for the game. It should be noted that the dialogues included in the MOD contain spoilers about the original game, so if you play it you have to take that detail into account and do so at your own risk.

In this new DDLC MOD for FNF (it's not the first, since we all know the popular VS Monika ) we can enjoy 4 new confrontations, one against each of the opponents included in the MOD. The design of the characters is not spectacular, but it sticks to the original characteristics of each of them based on the original game.

The MOD is full of numerous dialogues between songs that, as we have already mentioned, contain relevant information about the original story, so you have to be careful if you don't want to see spoilers. The most innovative detail of the MOD is its last confrontation, in which the perspective of the battle is changed to first person, with only our final rival, Monika, in front of us.

In general, it is a recommended MOD only for those who are fans of DDLC, since others will not find much interest in it, and they have much better options today. If you are a fan and can follow the story that is told in the dialogues, then this MOD is perfect for you.

New Features of FNF X DDLC MOD
  • 4 new songs.
  • 4 new characters: Monika, Natsuki, Sayori and Yuri.
  • New backgrounds and dialogs.
  • Some easter eggs and special cinematics.
